GSD.product_version: versions from v5.10.77 to before v5.10.163
GSD.description:
bpf, sockmap: Fix repeated calls to sock_put() when msg has more_data

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.163 by commit 28e4a763cd4a2b1a78852216ef4bd7df3a05cec6, it was introduced in version v5.10.77 by commit 15dec6d8f8642a26d6a272af2d7f9877df8f02b8. For more details please see the references link.
